name: aspear-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is frozen, it consumes this item to thaw itself. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures freezing.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when frozen to cure frozen.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A Poffin ingredient. It may be used or held by a Pokémon to defrost it.
flavor_text.platinum: A Poffin ingredient. It may be used or held by a Pokémon to defrost it.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to defrost it.
